sprint.name: Sprint 25 - Emergency Stabilization
sprint.goal: Fix critical infrastructure failures and stabilize the build

tasks.title: Remove duplicate chat interfaces
tasks.description: Delete redundant chat-interface.tsx and consolidate into ChatInterface.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: Only one chat interface component exists

tasks.title: Fix broken Jest configuration
tasks.description: Update jest.config.js to properly handle TypeScript and Next.js imports

tasks.title: Configure Jest environment setup
tasks.description: Fix jest.setup.js for proper DOM and React Testing Library integration

tasks.title: Remove mock auth service dependency
tasks.description: Replace mock-auth-service.py references with proper NextAuth integration

tasks.title: Audit and remove unused dependencies
tasks.description: Remove unused packages from package.json, check for vulnerabilities

tasks.title: Fix TypeScript compilation errors
tasks.description: Resolve all TypeScript errors in build process
acceptanceCriteria: npm run build completes without errors

tasks.title: Clean up broken test files
tasks.description: Remove or fix test files that cause build failures
acceptanceCriteria: Test suite can run without crashing

tasks.title: Fix ESLint configuration
tasks.description: Update ESLint rules to work with current codebase
acceptanceCriteria: npm run lint completes without configuration errors

tasks.title: Remove unused mock data imports
tasks.description: Identify and remove mock data imports from production components
acceptanceCriteria: No mock data imported in main app components

tasks.title: Fix Playwright test dependencies
tasks.description: Update Playwright configuration to handle current routing structure

tasks.title: Consolidate duplicate UI components
tasks.description: Merge duplicate button, card, and form components
acceptanceCriteria: Single source of truth for each UI component type

tasks.title: Fix Next.js routing conflicts
tasks.description: Resolve overlapping route definitions and middleware conflicts

tasks.title: Clean up unused API routes
tasks.description: Remove API routes that return mock data or are unused
acceptanceCriteria: All API routes serve real functionality

tasks.title: Fix broken imports in layout components
tasks.description: Resolve import path issues in Header, Sidebar, MainLayout
acceptanceCriteria: Layout components render without import errors

tasks.title: Remove development-only logging
tasks.description: Clean console.log statements and debug code from production
acceptanceCriteria: No console logs in production build

tasks.title: Fix environment variable loading
tasks.description: Ensure all required env vars are properly loaded and validated
acceptanceCriteria: App starts with missing env vars properly handled

tasks.title: Consolidate error boundary implementations
tasks.description: Merge multiple error boundary components into single reusable one
acceptanceCriteria: One error boundary component handling all error cases

tasks.title: Fix CSS class conflicts
tasks.description: Resolve Tailwind class conflicts and unused CSS

tasks.title: Remove broken WebSocket connections
tasks.description: Fix or remove non-functional WebSocket implementations
acceptanceCriteria: No WebSocket connection errors in console

tasks.title: Emergency deployment script
tasks.description: Create minimal deployment script that works with current state
acceptanceCriteria: Can deploy to staging without build failures
